{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} There is no Lux speed art... I'm really sad about it.. She was the best star guardian in my opinion.. No love for Lux, but Jinx... {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I'm a lux main and I feel your pain.{{item:3070}}
flat chested guardians + Janna
Lux isn't normally flat chested but in the star guardian skin she kinda is... maybe its the big bow?

Well, in the Star Guardian skin lore (separate from normal League lore) they're all supposed to be fairly young (as in, young enough for Chris Hansen to tell you to take a seat) except Janna, who's a bit older, perhaps 18 or 19.  So if you're the type to pay attention to breast size, this might be the explanation.
But then again, it might not.  What do I know.
Really? This is all you have to say? I don't even know what I should say to this, but it disgusted me enough to log in and reply to you. You're gross.
I didn't know that some players were still so thirsty. Now, get outta here. If you can't enjoy the art, then you don't have the right to see them.
I can enjoy that Janna art ;) and also you don't have the right to see them either. Cuz I said so in a comment.
He doesn't have the right, because all he is going to do is complain that they don't have tits. I can enjoy the art regardless of that.
A little more than shocked this isn't on the list.  http://songjikyo.deviantart.com/art/Star-Guardian-Jinx-636476897

It was pretty difficult to choose only one of SongJiKyo's pieces for the article, but this time we went with Poppy. =) They're all so beautiful though! http://songjikyo.deviantart.com/art/Star-Guardian-Poppy-637119400
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/v3aLEZxr-star-guardian-janna-fan-art really you guys couldnt even accept my artwork like lol!
the only complaint i have about new star guardian skins is there back animations are so different from lux's

I don't know why cus I'm not much of an artist but that poppy speed paint really stands out to me. the hair and the lighting with the little blue star... stunning. Again art is not my forte and I don't mean to insult the other art, but that one really pops out from the crowd to me.
HEY, I noticed alot of the english voice actresses from Madoka Magica made it into League of Legends! Homura = Riven, Sayaka = Jinx, Mami Tomoe = Lux, and Kyubey = Nami.
So many of these have such an amazingly high level of quality! Beautiful work by all.

OMG, I love this! Haha =) Thank you for sharing your art!
What amazing illustrations! So pretty ^o^
Yay Lighane! <3
Always loved these art posts. Particularly the speed paints. A lot of creating things like this is using the same methods in different ways, so it's a great way to find new ideas.
